verses.esv: 8 But if anyone does not provide for his relatives, and especially for members of his household, he has denied the faith and is worse than an unbeliever.
verses.kjv: 8 But if any provide not for his own, and specially for those of his own house, he hath denied the faith, and is worse than an infidel.
verses.niv: 8 If anyone does not provide for his relatives, and especially for his immediate family, he has denied the faith and is worse than an unbeliever.

verses.esv: 10 For even when we were with you, we would give you this command: If anyone is not willing to work, let him not eat.
verses.kjv: 10 For even when we were with you, this we commanded you, that if any would not work, neither should he eat.
verses.niv: 10 For even when we were with you, we gave you this rule: "If a man will not work, he shall not eat."

verses.esv:
9   Whoever is slack in his work
    is a brother to him who destroys.
verses.kjv: 9 He also that is slothful in his work is brother to him that is a great waster.
verses.niv: 9 One who is slack in his work is brother to one who destroys.

verses.esv: 12 And when they had eaten their fill, he told his disciples, “Gather up the leftover fragments, that nothing may be lost.”
verses.kjv: 12 When they were filled, he said unto his disciples, Gather up the fragments that remain, that nothing be lost.
verses.niv: 12 When they had all had enough to eat, he said to his disciples, "Gather the pieces that are left over. Let nothing be wasted."

verses.esv: 9 Six days you shall labor, and do all your work,
verses.kjv: 9 Six days shalt thou labour, and do all thy work:
verses.niv: 9 Six days you shall labor and do all your work,

verses.esv: 17 And he is before all things, and in him all things hold together.
verses.kjv: 17 And he is before all things, and by him all things consist.
verses.niv: 17 He is before all things, and in him all things hold together.

verses.esv: 15 The LORD God took the man and put him in the garden of Eden to work it and keep it.
verses.kjv: 15 And the LORD God took the man, and put him into the garden of Eden to dress it and to keep it.
verses.niv: 15 The LORD God took the man and put him in the Garden of Eden to work it and take care of it.

verses.esv: 4 In their case the god of this world has blinded the minds of the unbelievers, to keep them from seeing the light of the gospel of the glory of Christ, who is the image of God.
verses.kjv: 4 In whom the god of this world hath blinded the minds of them which believe not, lest the light of the glorious gospel of Christ, who is the image of God, should shine unto them.
verses.niv: 4 The god of this age has blinded the minds of unbelievers, so that they cannot see the light of the gospel of the glory of Christ, who is the image of God.

verses.esv: 36 Jesus answered, “My kingdom is not of this world. If my kingdom were of this world, my servants would have been fighting, that I might not be delivered over to the Jews. But my kingdom is not from the world.”
verses.kjv: 36 Jesus answered, My kingdom is not of this world: if my kingdom were of this world, then would my servants fight, that I should not be delivered to the Jews: but now is my kingdom not from hence.
verses.niv: 36 Jesus said, "My kingdom is not of this world. If it were, my servants would fight to prevent my arrest by the Jews. But now my kingdom is from another place."

verses.esv: 52 And Jesus increased in wisdom and in stature and in favor with God and man.
verses.kjv: 52 And Jesus increased in wisdom and stature, and in favour with God and man.
verses.niv: 52 And Jesus grew in wisdom and stature, and in favor with God and men.

verses.esv:
34   Righteousness exalts a nation,
    but sin is a reproach to any people.
verses.kjv: 34 Righteousness exalteth a nation: but sin is a reproach to any people.
verses.niv: 34 Righteousness exalts a nation, but sin is a disgrace to any people.

verses.esv: 16 All Scripture is breathed out by God and profitable for teaching, for reproof, for correction, and for training in righteousness,
verses.kjv: 16 All scripture is given by inspiration of God, and is profitable for doctrine, for reproof, for correction, for instruction in righteousness:
verses.niv: 16 All Scripture is God-breathed and is useful for teaching, rebuking, correcting and training in righteousness,

verses.esv: 29 But Peter and the apostles answered, “We must obey God rather than men.
verses.kjv: 29 Then Peter and the other apostles answered and said, We ought to obey God rather than men.
verses.niv: 29 Peter and the other apostles replied: "We must obey God rather than men!

verses.esv: 17 But Jesus answered them, “My Father is working until now, and I am working.”
verses.kjv: 17 But Jesus answered them, My Father worketh hitherto, and I work.
verses.niv: 17 Jesus said to them, "My Father is always at his work to this very day, and I, too, am working."
